attributes.action: Review Local Planning laws regarding boundary fences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the planning rules with regard to erecting wooden fencing around a garden. A female OAP,with a disabled daughter in CLevedon,paid to have a fence around the side of her house, Highways had no objection,the coundil say it has to be moved back 0.05 of a metre as it is near a pathway.
The fence is for her security and her disabled daughter,previously there was 30 foot conifers which were an eyesore and difficult to maintain. Beaurocracy seems to have gone mad, 271 other premises have these fences but she must
either move hers back or take it down and build a 6 foot brick wall. Where is the logic.This is Somerset county council for Clevedon district.
